I think both topics are very interesting. However if
you do the Meiji Restoration and Samurai Rebelions of
1876-1877 you with have a more defined topic. The
Begining of the Buke and their rise to prominance in
Japan covers much of the Heian Period. Were as the
last years of the Tokugawa Shogunate, Meiji
Restoration and Satsuma Rebelion is more defined and
more accurate information is available. Your talking
several decades as appossed to several centuries. 

But its your paper you do what you feel your most
comfortable with.
--- coeli jimenez <coeli_tensai@...> wrote:
> hi..
>  
> i need some help. i am supposed to write an
> argumentative paper for my language class. my chosen
> topic is:
>  
> Which is better, the "original" samurai (those who
> started the military class) or the "last" samurai
> (tokugawa to meiji eras)?
>  
> can anybody help me please? i need facts and notes,
> as well as ideas about the whole thing. i would
> appreciate it if you can email me personally..
>  
> thank you.
> 
> 
> Coeli
